EmailTemplate.subject: Experienced Leaders Wanted! Work on the NCS programme again!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG/SEASONAL-ROLES
Please do not reply to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.Name},
The NCS summer programme is fast approaching and we are still incredibly keen for our best leaders from previous years to get involved!
Although our records show that you are yet to apply to work on the programme in 2015, we hope that we may have come up with a flexible solution to make NCS more accessible for you this summer.
Tell me more!
The NCS programme, and all the young people who take part, benefit hugely from the experience of good quality returning staff. At the same time we recognise that we can ask for a lot from our seasonal staff in terms of time commitment and flexibility, and that some of you may not have been able to reapply this year due to other commitments. With this in mind, this summer we are trialing the idea of having 1-week cover periods for our PLs and APLs.
In order to do this, we need to know how many of our alumni leaders would be interested in joining the programme on a cover-basis with a decreased level of time commitment.
Sounds great - what do I need to do?
If you think this sounds like a great opportunity for you, please get in touch with the relevant staffing team below, stating your availability and preferred locations, quoting the email reference number (below).
South London & Surrey: staffingsouthlondonandsurrey@the-challenge.org West London: staffingwestlondon@the-challenge.org North-East London: staffingnortheastlondon@the-challenge.org Bucks & Berks: staffingbucksandberks@the-challenge.org West Midlands: staffingwestmidlands@the-challenge.org North West England: staffingnorthwest@the-challenge.org
What happens next?
A Staffing Associate will be in touch to coordinate the next steps. Of course, if you're interested in working for a full wave we are still welcoming applications through the Staffing Website!
Many thanks for your continued support, and we hope to work with you again this summer!
Best wishes, The Staffing Team The Challenge NCS Programme
Email reference: CA 8.2
